title: Michael HIll
description: During my tenure at Michael Hill, I made significant contributions to the main website, where I established architectural patterns and conventions. I worked on various projects, integrating the OCAPI API to support our Nuxt framework. Additionally, I led the rebranding of the site and successfully managed to deliver during the time frame. I also introduced Tailwind as our CSS framework and provided training to other team members.

title: Mcgrath
description: The District Group produced the IA, UX, and UI for the McGrath digital experience. As part of this collaborative project, I spearheaded the front-end development to optimize the site's functionality within the Sitecore content management system. Leveraging an insightful content strategy and Sitecore’s personalization capabilities, we ensured that users receive tailored, relevant information with each visit to the McGrath site.

title: National Rugby League
description: During my time working with the NRL I updated the main NRL website and team websites using vue apps, handlebars, Fractal and custom css frameworks. I have also been in charge of updating the front end development process and adding new features, like our webpack bundler and migrating some apps to Vue 3.

title: Asteroids 1979
description: A game created with vanilla javascript. I was trying to test the possibilities in creative writing with a simple game base on the classic Asteroids game.

title: Earth Moon System
description: An example of using Three.js to create an scene with the Earth and the Moon. The user can rotate the scene and zoom in and out. Responsive and mobile friendly.

title: Soundscape
description: An excercies using websockets, p5.js, ruby, node and js.

title: Park Victoria
description: As part of CodeHouse group, I was responsible for the front-end development of the Parks Victoria website. I worked closely with the design team to ensure that the site’s functionality was optimized for the Sitecore content management system. The site was designed to be user-friendly and engaging, with a focus on providing users with relevant information about Victoria’s parks and reserves
